Class OrderDAOImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.AbstractDAO
      • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.OrderDAO
        • by.khmyl.cafe.dao.impl.OrderDAOImpl

  • public class OrderDAOImpl
extends OrderDAO
    Creates a connection to database with the help of ConnectionPool, and realizes a set of requests to database for order.
